overview: Founded in 2009 as lead-handler, and based in Kadima, Israel and Sunnyvale, California, Clantro is a new way for online sellers to respond to user reactions in real time, no matter if it’s a smartphone, tablet or PC. Clantro helps SMBs and non technical marketing proffesionals to understand what the consumer is looking for, how does he feel as he goes through the flow and most importantly - why is he about to leave the site, and then create a specific marketing respons to that will keep the consumer satisfied and lift conversion rates. The company has raised $1million from an Israeli incubator and self funding, and is serving online sellers around the globe.
